title: [19. Remove Nth Node From End of List](https://leetcode.cn/problems/remove-nth-node-from-end-of-list/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
19. Remove Nth Node From End of List Description Given the head of a linked list, remove the nth node from the end of the list and return its head.
 
Example 1:
Input: head = [1,2,3,4,5], n = 2 Output: [1,2,3,5] Example 2:
Input: head = [1], n = 1 Output: [] Example 3:
Input: head = [1,2], n = 1 Output: [1]  
Constraints:
The number of nodes in the list is sz. 1 <= sz <= 30 0 <= Node.val <= 100 1 <= n <= sz  
Follow up: Could you do this in one pass?
Related Topics Linked List Two Pointers Similar Questions Swapping Nodes in a Linked List Delete N Nodes After M Nodes of a Linked List Delete the Middle Node of a Linked List
